experience.description: Led the frontend engineering team to build scalable React applications. Improved web performance by 40% and established a comprehensive design system used across 12 products.
highlights: Architected and shipped a component library used by 50+ engineers
Reduced page load times by 40% through code-splitting and edge caching
Led migration from Pages Router to App Router for 8 production apps
Mentored 4 junior developers through pair programming sessions

experience.description: Developed and maintained full-stack e-commerce platforms using Next.js, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. Integrated payment gateways and optimized server response times by 3x.
highlights: Built checkout flows handling $2M+ in monthly transactions
Designed RESTful APIs serving 10K+ requests per second
Implemented real-time dashboards with WebSocket connections
Reduced API response times from 800ms to 120ms

experience.description: Designed user-centric interfaces for mobile and web apps. Conducted user research, created interactive prototypes, and improved conversion rates by 25%.
highlights: Redesigned onboarding flow, increasing activation by 25%
Created design system with 120+ reusable components
Conducted 40+ user interviews to inform product decisions
Collaborated with engineering to ensure pixel-perfect implementation

education.description: Focused on Human-Computer Interaction and Software Engineering. Dean's List all 8 semesters.
highlights: Capstone project: AI-powered design tool (awarded Best in Show)
Teaching assistant for CS 193X: Web Programming Fundamentals
President of the Design & Technology Club

education.description: Professional certification covering user research, wireframing, prototyping, and usability testing.
highlights: Portfolio project selected for Google's showcase gallery
